type.name: org.gradle.api.resources.ResourceException
type.description: Generic resource exception that all other resource-related exceptions inherit from.

method.name: getLocation
method.description:
Returns the location of the resource, if known.

returns:The location, or null if not known.

property.name: location
property.description:
Returns the location of the resource, if known.

returns:The location, or null if not known.
